Failed to locate, please check permissions
No local storage permission on the phone
Call failed to be established, please check the permissions
ⓘThe Storage and Media permission is used to read files from the device and send them with a message
ⓘThe Fine Location permission is used to get the location information through the GPS and send it as a location message.
ⓘThe Coarse Location permission is used to get the latitude and longitude information through WiFi or mobile base station and send it as a location message.
ⓘThe Camera permission is used to take photos or videos, and send them with a messages, or scan QR codes to obtain user information or App ID
ⓘThe Microphone permission is used to record and send voice messages, or to make real-time audio and video calls

Welcome to Lanying IM!

 Please read carefully and fully understand the terms of the User Agreement and Privacy Policy, including but not limited to: In order to provide you with instant messaging, content sharing and other services, we need to collect your device information, operation logs and other personal information

for more information. If you agree, please click "Agree" to accept our services.
